title: Maize Planting Recommendation
description: Based on your location and soil conditions, we recommend planting maize variety SC627 with a spacing of 75cm between rows and 25cm between plants.

title: Fertilizer Application
description: Apply 200kg/ha of Compound D fertilizer at planting and top-dress with 100kg/ha of Urea 4-6 weeks after planting.

title: Fall Armyworm Alert
description: Increased risk of Fall Armyworm infestation detected in your area. Monitor fields twice daily and apply appropriate treatment if threshold is reached.
